Reviews.Content: im reasonably mood ill round 2 yes airport hotel sort tin firstly transfer form airport absolute age didnt picking terminal secondly checkin real chore people desk third enjoy walking dark wed transported camp fourth leave morning offer coffee machine doughnut breakfast ok youre homer simpson guess guy desk grumpy positives clean close airport wont rushing

Reviews.Content: barajas airport ok arrive 9 pm call schedule pick 15 minutes bad experience clean bathroom pretty breakfast staff expect carrying luggage walking food 9 pm except packed sandwiches schedule airport day time service

Reviews.Title: “avoid at all costs - total rip off”

Reviews.Content: agree previous comments entirely hotel classed motel outside main building 2 storey blocks metal front doors makes look cells hotel stranded madrid overnight using tourist info centre airport available 4 people hotel charged euros found booked line search engine €40 standard double 2 extra camp beds food overpriced restaurant basic sandwich costing €6 coffee offer free drink free drink cant choose cheap white fizzy wine mixed orange juice walls paper thin ground floor noise coming night stayed particularly noisy reception complain fair deal internet connection slow push free cheaper hotels locally time express breakfast served hotel reception €3 coffee sticky bun free shuttle bus airport
